code: import{useState}from"react";import"./PriceAlertSettings.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function PriceAlertSettings(_ref){let{crops=[]}=_ref;const[crop,setCrop]=useState("");const[minPrice,setMinPrice]=useState("");const[maxPrice,setMaxPrice]=useState("");const saveAlert=()=>{if(!crop){alert("Please select crop");return;}localStorage.setItem("priceAlert",JSON.stringify({crop,minPrice,maxPrice}));alert("âœ… Price alert saved");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"alert-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"\uD83D\uDD14 Price Alert Settings"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:crop,onChange:e=>setCrop(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",children:"\uD83C\uDF3E Select Crop"}),crops.filter(Boolean).map((c,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:c,children:c},i))]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Alert if price below \u20B9",value:minPrice,onChange:e=>setMinPrice(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Alert if price above \u20B9",value:maxPrice,onChange:e=>setMaxPrice(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:saveAlert,children:"Save Alert"})]});}export default PriceAlertSettings;
